name: 1GCX
intro: Digital asset and tokenized carbon credit exchange
introduce: 1GCX is a digital asset exchange offering cryptocurrency, commodity, and carbon offset trading. The platform was founded to develop the future of environmental and energy markets. 1GCX’s mission is to empower the digital and sustainable revolution, de-stagnating the flow of both capital and financial assets to best build and expand energy, environmental, and financial markets. 1GCX provides the first global digital carbon registry to incentivize scaling and rigorous classification of carbon assets.
